content: before starting knitting this i ve studied a lot of photos from the hp 3 & 4 movies with gryffindor and ravenclaw scarves including the number of row and stitches because i want to make as screen-accurate scarf as possible *i d be grateful if someone who owns a gryffindor scarf from noble collection could check if i haven t made any mistakes* **the original scarves are acc to noble collection 100% lambs wool 12 wide and 85 long** *i don t know if this includes the fringe but judging from my scarf it doesn t* my scarf measures about the same the original scarves have a machine-made fringe so i improvised mine the crochet band without the tassels is about 2 5 cm 0 98 wide and the tassels are about the same length in total the fringe with tassels is 5 cm 1 97 wide this scarf is easy to knit it just takes some time i finished mine in 2 weeks nature spun yarn colors slytherin - n25 enchanted forest & n03 grey heather ravenclaw - n04 blue knight & n03 grey heather or n94 bev s bear for a book-version scarf gryffindor - 235 beet red or 225 brick road & 308 sunburst gold hufflepuff - 305 impasse yellow & 601 pepper black download this pattern as pdf here 1 ___ i ll be glad to answer any questions about this pattern but please read the pattern and the comments section first as many questions have already been answered there with links to helpful videos 1 https //www dropbox com/s/mgns7tc0ymv47zt/hp%20slytherin%20house%20scarf pdf
